==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Etymology===
Combination of {{zh-l|名|given name}} and {{zh-l|字|courtesy name, given to an individual at adulthood}}. Originally two different types of names in ancient China, in modern Chinese the two characters form a single word.
